section.p: Enter the amount for any adjustments you plan to take this year. The amounts may be different from last year.

Adjustments are expenses, payments,contributions, and fees that taxpayers can subtract from their total income. These adjustments reduce the amount of income that will be taxed. They're also sometimes called deductions.
This estimator only supports some adjustments.There may be other adjustments that you qualify for, which could impact your estimate.
